name: Google Multi Location Accordion
author: Local Map Co.

sections.description: This plugin allows users to display multiple locations via the use of a single shortcode. Users will be able to select the location, add logo, add contact details, and choose the color directly inside of their admin dashboard. The front-end display will be a location accordion that is both user friendly and great for Local SEO.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->MBB Plugin screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->MBB Plugin screen to configure the plugin

Does this plugin have support?

Yes! If you need support for this plugin feel free to go to our website at http://localmap.co and use the contact form. A support representative will respond promptly.

Can I Display my business name in the map?

Yes, you are able to use your places ID to display your location marker for your business.

Is this plugin helpful for SEO?

Yes, google will identify “location signals” when it crawls your website, this plugin allows you to display your location signals in an intuitive format.

short_description: Display multiple google business locations with a shortcode [mbb_shortcode].
description: This plugin allows users to display multiple locations via the use of a single shortcode. Users will be able to select the location, add logo, add contact details, and choose the color directly inside of their admin dashboard. The front-end display will be a location accordion that is both user friendly and great for Local SEO.
